NWL.JO.summary: Nu-World Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, imports, assembles, markets, and distributes branded consumer durables in South Africa, Australia, Brazil, Hong Kong, the United Arab Emirates, and Lesotho. The company offers consumer electronics, hi-tech products, small electrical appliances, white goods, liquors, furniture, and personal protective equipment. The company was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Johannesburg, South Africa.
